LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_1stMutationChance: Configure the first group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_2ndMutationChance: Configure the second group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_3rdMutationChance: Configure the third group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ChanceToHaveAMutatedGene: 1st group's chance to have a mutated gene
2nd group's chance to have a mutated gene
3rd group's chance to have a mutated gene
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_AllowedMutatedXenoGene_T: Default: Mutated genes can only be endogenes.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_AllowedMutatedArchiteGen: Mutated genes can be archite genes
Defaul: Mutated genes can not be archite genes.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_MinimumMetabolicEffForMu: Minimum metabolic efficiency allowed when generating mutation
The minimum metabolic efficiency allowed used by ONLY this mod.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ChanceWithGrowingCarcino: The chance to develop random mutation with a growing carcinoma every 5000 ticks
These muations do NOT obey minimum metabolic efficiency and are always xenogene. Check every 5k ticks. A day has 60k ticks.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ChanceWithModerateToxicB: The chance to develop random mutation with a moderate (or worse) toxic buildup.
These muations do NOT obey minimum metabolic efficiency and are always xenogene. Check every 5k ticks. A day has 60k ticks.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_LetterText: {0}'s genes have mutated due to {1}. {2} is now in his/her xenogenes.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_LetterText_Source_ToxicB: a harmful amount of toxic buildup
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_WhiteList: White list genes (use defName or LabelShortAdj)
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_WhiteList_Tooltip: Only genes with these names can be chosen for random mutations. Leave empty to allow all. Separate by comma. Overriden by black list.
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_BlackList: Black list genes (use defName or LabelShortAdj)
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_BlackList_Tooltip: Genes with these names cannot be chosen for random mutations. Separate by comma. Override white list
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ShowAllGeneDefName: Show all found gene's defName on debug console
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ShowAllGeneDefName_Toolt: Good to find out a gene defName for black list or white list. Enable dev mode to see the debug console. Show every time mod settings changed.
